body.name: Sleepmax 14 Inch Queen Mattress - Hybrid Bed Mattress in a Box - Memory Foam with Individual Pocket Springs - Made in USA - Fiberglass Free Motion Isolation Firm Mattress
body.stockDetail: Only 19 left in stock - order soon.

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: LUXURY HYBRID MATTRESS - This mattress combines the benefits of innerspring & memory foam mattress. Individually wrapped coils minimize the motion disturbances; while memory foam & high density foam evenly support your spine and relieve pressure points.

RELIABLE US QUALITY - Made in USA, foams are CertiPUR-US certified, fiber-glass free and non toxic; the mattress cover is OEKO-TEX certified with fire retardant material; we only provide eco-friendly and quality mattress that meets or exceeds the US standards.

THE RIGHT FIRMNESS - Euro top design provides an extra comfort layer, along with multiple layers of foam for decompression; the bottom support system adopts 13/15 gauge pocket springs (with reinforced edge); The overall feel is supportive and comfortable, perfect for most people.

MATTRESS IN A BOX: - We compactly compress, roll, and vacuum-seal the bed in a box, ensuring efficient shipping and easy setup. Please allow at least 72 hours for the bed mattress to expand to its original shape and dissipate any potential odor.

VALUE FOR MONEY - With more than 40 years of dedicated expertise in mattress production, our factory has consistently delivered hight quality mattress with affordable prices.This bed mattress is undoubtedly worth your exploration and investment. We are 24/7 right here for you.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Memory Foam Comfort Layer + Individually Pocket Spring
Previous page Next page 1 Enjoy it 2 All Places 3

Does this mattress contain fiberglass? No, rest assured that our mattresses are fiberglass-free and non toxic. Do you feel movement of another person beside you? No, this hybrid mattress crafts with memory foam and pocket springs, you won't feel any movement from other person. Do I need a box spring to use the mattress? No, you don't need a box spring. It can be used on slatted frame, platform bed, metal grid or box spring, depends on what you have. How long does it take to set up the mattress? The mattress will do most of its expanding within the first few hours, once unpacked. Full expansion can take up to 72 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Needed a new mattress. This one fit all the boxes of what we were looking for. Great price and perfect firmness for me. Did have to add an egg crate pad for my husband as he needed just a little more softness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a very comfortable mattress the 14" thickness is a big improvement over the old 12" memory foam one we had for 6 years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The edges are not firm
reviews.reviewText: Seems like a very good mattress. I like the way it feels. Given the quality of the mattress, the sides are quite soft and squishy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ve only slept on it one night and it met my expectations. It’s nice, firm, and cozy at the same time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'm in love with a mattress!
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical about buying a mattress online and having it delivered flattened and rolled up . But now to my surprise, I think I'm in love with a mattress! Really, this has got to be the best mattress I've had in my 60 year adult life. I am really enjoying my sleep, so much so that I begin taking naps again. At one point I thought I would have to go see a doctor about my back, now I wake up with absolutely no back pain. This May sound exaggerated but believe me I rarely give anything 5 stars. It took me a minute to get used to the memory foam, initially if it felt like I was crawling out of a hole in the morning. Once it found out it was heat activated I realized I could adjust the firmness by adding another sheet. Now it's dang near perfect. I've only had it for about 6 weeks so I can't speak to its durability. But for now, I would highly recommend this matchers especially if you are a large person and sleep on your side.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars I lost my money and gained nights of nightmares.
reviews.reviewText: I had high expectations for this mattress, but within just two months of purchasing the bed, we noticed that, upon assembling it, it started to sink significantly. Despite both of us weighing relatively little, with 176 lbs and 112 lbs respectively, the mattress sags excessively in the center, creating a sensation akin to an deflated mattress. Unfortunately, this situation has resulted in waking up with back pain, making the sleeping experience uncomfortable and unsatisfactory. It is regrettable to lose the money invested in this purchase, as we believe it to be a low-quality product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble and very strong
reviews.reviewText: I am not great at putting things together but this was simple enough to do myself. It is sturdy and there is no noise. This is by far, the best box spring I have seen

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Great for four months!!!
reviews.reviewText: Mattress was great for foYour months then it seems to lose it firmness. The sides started buckling, saggy in the middle worst of all the cool gel wasn't keeping us cool. Really regret purchasing this mattress!!!
